Name Gloss CONTROL IS VERTICALITY
Name Transcription
Aliases

CONTROL IS VERTICALITY

CONTROL IS UP

DEGREE OF CONTROL IS VERTICALITY

Description
Comments
Tags orientational
Family Orientational Metaphors, Primary Metaphors
Metaphor Level
Metaphor Type Primary
Experiential Basis
Cultural Scope
Source Frame Verticality
Roles:scalar_position, vertical_entity, verticality_scale, vertical_axis
Target Frame Control
Roles:controlling_entity, dependent_entity, dependent_process, dependent_variable, degree_of_control, scope_of_ control, controlling_process, ability_to_control, control_relation, control_relation_status


Mappings:


Related Metaphors:


Entailments:

Target Entailment Having control over someone
Source Inference High point on a vertical scale
Type of Inferential Structure scalar
Entailed Metaphor(s) CONTROL IS UP
Target Entailment Being controlled by someone
Source Inference Low point on a vertical scale
Type of Inferential Structure
Entailed Metaphor(s) SUBJUGATION IS DOWN
